name: The Reaper's Call
description:
The Reaper's Call is an isometric third person cartoon souls-like where you play as Mystic, a mage that wants to recover it's body from the claws of the madows, a shadow race, with the help of Impera, your faithfull companion. You will have to advance on the game by killing different enemies such as bats, pots... using your scythe and your mage powers.

Video Gameplay:

https://youtu.be/c6VjVB0_lm0

Download Instrucctions: 

  1. Download the file named "TheReapersCall.rar".
  2. Unpack the zip on your computer.
  3. Open the folder and execute the file "The Reaper's Call.exe".
  4. You can play and have fun ^^.
